document_data.name: Ulbegh
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulbegh''' was an inhabitant of [[Scornubel]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Late in the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, [[Belgon Bradaskor]] made a remark to [[Tornar]] that the noblewoman who had slain Ulbegh last summer, strongly implying {{yearlink|1356}},Summer in Faerun lasts from mid-[[Kythorn]] through [[Flamerule]] and [[Eleasis]] to mid-[[Eleint]]. As ''Spellfire'' starts in Flamerule and lasts for two months, and ''Hand of Fire'' ends before 1358, "last" summer has to be 1356, because the narration occurs almost certainly through autumn; had it been the summer of 1357, it would likely not be referred to as "last" summer. was his source for the report that [[Ornrim]] had been replaced by a shapeshifter. Tornar knew it was [[Tessaril Winter]].
